member.summary: method for beginning a database transaction

member.name: M:Mincetur.Administracion.TramiteDocumentario.DaTramiteDocumentario.daUDml.CommitTransactions(System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction)
member.summary: method for doing a commit on the specified transaction. The transaction in this case is clobal to this class (for demonstrative purposes only). If it fails then we let the user know and why
member.param: the SqlTransaction we're carrying around with us

member.name: M:Mincetur.Administracion.TramiteDocumentario.DaTramiteDocumentario.daUDml.RollbackTransaction(System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction@)
member.summary: method for rolling back a transaction because something went wrong this is to help maintain data integrity
member.param: the transaction we are doing a rollback on

member.name: M:Mincetur.Administracion.TramiteDocumentario.DaTramiteDocumentario.daUDml.ThrowOracleException
member.summary: since SqlException has no default constructors and we cannot throw one we use this method to call RAISERROR on the SQL side of things to cause a OracleException
